favourite.article: Amen. O Jehovah, cause me to know my end, And the measure of my days, what it is. May I know how transient I am.
Lord, teach us to number our days that we may gain a heart of wisdom. I enjoy this song! It reminds me of how fleeting our days are...
Thanks hymnal.net, I learned this hymn when I was grade school. This is one of our theme songs with the Lord.
